value:
It's finally here! The Day of Devotion!
I've been waiting so long to tell Alm
how I truly feel!

The butchers at market were so glad
for all I was buying that they threw in
these oxtails. They're great for soup!

Want some leftovers? I've got plenty
of choice steaks! We can call it your
Day of Devotion gift from me!

Silque saw an artist working wonders
with spun sugar over there. Want to
come with us and see?

In hindsight...maybe asking for an
entire side of beef was a mistake.
I hope Alm has room for it all...

Hey, guess who's coming by to check
out the festivities? It's your friend,
$Nf! Join us!

With the power of love, you can do
anything you put your mind to!

This pales in comparison to my
feelings for Alm!

Do I need to put more love into it?
But I'm spoken for... How about
just a hug?

A gift? Oh, thank you so much! This
is almost as good as getting a present
from Alm!

Hi! I'm Faye. I've got some important
deliveries here for Alm! Have you
seen him around at all?

Gray and Tobin won't stop teasing
me for giving Alm gifts. Like it's
wrong to show you care!$k$pThey're so weird. Tobin was head
over heels for a girl in our village,
once. He had no idea what to do.$k$pHis way of handling it was to annoy
her until she couldn't stand the sight
of him. How ridiculous is that?$k$pIf you like someone, being mean to
them is the last thing you should do.
You'd think that would be obvious.$k$pEven if Alm doesn't ever return my
feelings, at least he knows I would
never do anything to hurt him!
そーれ！
狙い撃ち！
きゃあっ
贈り物が…
Enjoy!
It's meant to be!
You'll see!
This is for you, Alm!
So much left unsaid...
えへへっ
I'm the archer of love, and I'm taking aim straight at Alm's heart!
Don't touch that! That's a gift for Alm. That one too. They're all for Alm, OK?!
Alm loves meat, so...I went to the market and bought it all. Can never be too careful!
Silque doesn't like meat, so I got her flowers instead. I hope she likes them!
Do you think Alm will like my outfit?
The Day of Devotion is the perfect time for me to let out my true feelings!
I don't know what to do with all this meat I bought for Alm. Do you want some sausage? Or jerky?
Special delivery!
What would you like?
I've got the goods!
